idiom.meaning: Using completely wrong method for a task
idiom.example: The company sought manufacturing efficiency by hiring more managers instead of upgrading equipment

shortDescription: Mencius first used this vivid image of climbing trees (缘木) to catch fish (求鱼) in the 4th century BCE, criticizing approaches that ignore natural principles. The absurdity of seeking aquatic life in arboreal settings perfectly captured the futility of mismatched methods and goals....
